cards.title: [x] customizable agent prompt
cards.description: Implement ability for user to customize the agent prompt for the ki thinking partner.

cards.title: [x] website NOW kanban board
cards.description: Interactive Kanban board displaying current projects and tasks in the 'about the builder' section. Features three columns (To Do, Doing, Done) with color-coded cards based on project type. Cards expand inline to show detailed breakdowns, process notes, and timestamps.
cards.processNotes: Built with React components, uses existing Flexoki theme variables for consistency. Data stored in JSON for easy updates. Designed to be API-ready for future dynamic updates.

cards.title: [ ] integrate oura mcp server
cards.description: integrate oura mcp into Ki, providing agents and system with richer physiological context

cards.title: [x] timer | calendar system
cards.description: a timer system that providescontext for what the user is doing as they capture voice notes
cards.processNotes: Created a timer component in the mobile app where the user can create tasks for the day. Attached to these tasks is a timer that when they start, tracks the duration of the task. Completed tasks form flow/activity blocks on the user's calendar. Created a calendar component in the web app that displays the user's timer sessions as blocks, along side their captures (voice, media)

cards.title: ~ • KI • ~
cards.processNotes: writing the story i have been trying to tell for years but could never articulate

cards.title: [x] build out site for launch
cards.description: build out site with all the sections and pages

cards.title: [ ] strava integration
cards.description: integrate strava into Ki, adding the user's movement data to the system

cards.title: Ki Beta Release
cards.description: release the first beta version of Ki
